devdoc.details: When used with GovernorBravo the owner of this contract must be set to the Timelock contract

estimateFees(uint16,bytes,bytes).details: The estimated fees are the minimum required, it's recommended to increase the fees amount when sending a message. The unused amount will be refunded

params.adapterParams: The params used to specify the custom amount of gas required for the execution on the destination
params.payload: The payload to be sent to the remote chain. It's computed as follows payload = abi.encode(targets, values, signatures, calldatas)
params.remoteChainId: The LayerZero id of a remote chain

returns.nativeFee: The amount of fee in the native gas token (e.g. ETH)
returns.zroFee: The amount of fee in ZRO token

execute(uint16,bytes,bytes).details: Stores the hash of the execution parameters if sending fails (e.g., due to insufficient fees)

params.adapterParams: The params used to specify the custom amount of gas required for the execution on the destination
params.payload: The payload to be sent to the remote chain. It's computed as follows payload = abi.encode(targets, values, signatures, calldatas)
params.remoteChainId: The LayerZero id of the remote chain

params.configType: Type of configuration. Every messaging library has its own convention.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

retryExecute(uint64,uint16,bytes,bytes,u.details: Allows to provide more fees if needed. The extra fees will be refunded to the caller

params.adapterParams: The params used to specify the custom amount of gas required for the execution on the destination
params.nonce: The nonce to identify a failed message
params.originalValue: The msg.value passed when execute() function was called
params.payload: The payload to be sent to the remote chain. It's computed as follows payload = abi.encode(targets, values, signatures, calldatas)
params.remoteChainId: The LayerZero id of the remote chain

params.chainId: The LayerZero chainId for the pending config change
params.config: The configuration in bytes. It can encode arbitrary content
params.configType: The type of configuration. Every messaging library has its own convention

params.remoteAddress: The address of the contract on the remote chain to receive messages sent by this contract
params.remoteChainId: The LayerZero id of a remote chain

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Omnichain Governance Proposal Sender

ClearPayload(uint64,bytes32).notice: Emitted when a previously failed message successfully sent to the remote chain

ExecuteRemoteProposal(uint16,bytes).notice: Emitted when a proposal execution request sent to the remote chain

SetTrustedRemoteAddress(uint16,bytes).notice: Emitted when a remote message receiver is set for the remote chain

StorePayload(uint64,uint16,bytes,bytes,u.notice: Emitted when an execution hash of a failed message saved

estimateFees(uint16,bytes,bytes).notice: Estimates LayerZero fees for cross-chain message delivery to the remote chain

execute(uint16,bytes,bytes).notice: Sends a message to execute a remote proposal

getConfig(uint16,uint16,uint256).notice: Gets the configuration of the LayerZero messaging library of the specified version

lzEndpoint().notice: LayerZero endpoint for sending messages to remote chains

setConfig(uint16,uint16,uint256,bytes).notice: Sets the configuration of the LayerZero messaging library of the specified version

setSendVersion(uint16).notice: Sets the configuration of the LayerZero messaging library of the specified version

setTrustedRemoteAddress(uint16,bytes).notice: Sets the remote message receiver address

trustedRemoteLookup(uint16).notice: Specifies the allowed path for sending messages (remote chainId => remote app address + local app address)

userdoc.notice: Sends a proposal's data to remote chains for execution after the proposal passes on the main chain
